scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --profile dashlabs4 --template cloudformation/dash-sdk-ecs-v1.yml --s3-bucket=dashscan --output-template-file output/template.yml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --profile dashlabs4 --template-file output/template.yml --stack-name dashsdk-iac-scan-stack2 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --tags project=dashsdk
scripts.delete: yarn setenv && aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name dashsdk-iac-scan-stack2
scripts.push: yarn setenv && yarn package && yarn deploy
